description: The initiative focuses on creating eco-friendly products, specifically germinable plates made from agricultural waste. Launched in 2009, the project aims to reduce pollution caused by traditional disposable items. With a commitment to sustainability, the initiative also empowers vulnerable populations, including single mothers and incarcerated individuals, by providing job opportunities. Over the years, it has garnered multiple awards and recognition for its innovative approach to environmental protection and social responsibility.
name: Lifepack
